traits.Telepathic Hub: When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.

actions.Multiattack: The mindwitness makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Tentacles: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 20 (4d8 + 2) psychic damage. if the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13+1d6 + 10) and must succeed on a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.
actions.Eye Rays: The mindwitness shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:
